name: move-tab-to-next-window
description: Move tab to next window browser context menu extension

scripts.build-assets: mkdir dist || true && cp src-assets/* dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-assets && parcel build src/index.ts --no-source-maps
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build-assets && parcel src/index.ts

author: Roman Shevtsov
